headline: Why Northrop Grumman Corporation (NOC) Is Gaining This Week?
summary: We recently published a list of Why These Defense Stocks Are Gaining This Week. In this article, we will take a look at where Northrop Grumman Corporation (NYSE:NOC) stands against other defense stocks gaining this week. According to The International Institute for Strategic Studies (IISS), global defense spending soared to a record high of $2.46 […]

headline: Boeing Wins Contract to Support F/A-18 Aircraft Program
summary: BA is set to provide for the repair of the landing edge flap antenna used on the F/A-18 aircraft.

raw.headline: Boeing Wins Contract to Support F/A-18 Aircraft Program

headline: Lockheed Wins a $208M Contract to Aid JASSM Missile Program
summary: LMT secures a $208.1 million contract to aid the Joint Air-to-Surface Standoff Missile program.

headline: Weighing Northrop Grumman As The F/A-XX Program Winner (Rating Downgrade)
summary: Northrop Grumman Corporation could be selected as the prime contractor for the F/A-XX Program. Click here to read an analysis of NOC stock now.
